content.raw:
So I like Option 1 as well and will do the changes needed tomorrow. But where does PyQt5 testing happen? Do we just say that we have pyqt5 compatibility but don‘t recommend it yet and disscuss problems in Isssue threads?
(I‘m typing this on my phone so there might be autocorrections that made things worse)
